name: AdQue
0:
”Alexa open add cue”
”Show me weather on right screen”
”Show me orders on left screen”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: add cue
des: This skill will allow you as an AdQue customer to control your displays using any Alexa enabled device to include a smart phone. Please contact Data Concepts, Inc. at 877.246.7587 to receive login credentials for your device. We'll work with you to setup the displays you'd like to target. We'll also provide additional information concerning setup and usage.
